mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.doc_id AS "doc_id", a.se_id AS "se_id", a.jkdacxfw AS "jkdacxfw", a.jkxxfbglfw AS "jkxxfbglfw", a.wsyyhtxfw AS "wsyyhtxfw", a.jkjyxxfw AS "jkjyxxfw"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ironfo_information_sx_jkxxfw( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, doc_id, se_id, jkdacxfw, jkxxfbglfw, wsyyhtxfw, jkjyxxfw ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{doc_id}, #{se_id}, #{jkdacxfw}, #{jkxxfbglfw}, #{wsyyhtxfw}, #{jkjyxxfw} )

INSERT INTO ironfo_information_sx_jkxxfw( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, doc_id, se_id, jkdacxfw, jkxxfbglfw, wsyyhtxfw, jkjyxxfw ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{doc_id}, #{se_id}, #{jkdacxfw}, #{jkxxfbglfw}, #{wsyyhtxfw}, #{jkjyxxfw} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ironfo_information_sx_jkxxfw SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, doc_id = #{doc_id}, se_id = #{se_id}, jkdacxfw = #{jkdacxfw}, jkxxfbglfw = #{jkxxfbglfw}, wsyyhtxfw = #{wsyyhtxfw}, jkjyxxfw = #{jkjyxxfw} WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE ironfo_information_sx_jkxxfw SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, doc_id = #{doc_id}, se_id = #{se_id}, jkdacxfw = #{jkdacxfw}, jkxxfbglfw = #{jkxxfbglfw}, wsyyhtxfw = #{wsyyhtxfw}, jkjyxxfw = #{jkjyxxfw} WHERE id = #{id}
